name: market for fava bean, feed, Swiss integrated production | fava bean, feed, Swiss integrated production | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21554/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This dataset represents the supply of 1 kg of 'fava bean, feed, Swiss integrated production' from activities that produce it within the geography of CH. Transportation is included in this market, based on Valsasina, L. (2016), "Default transport data per commodity group for Switzerland, ecoinvent database version 3.3, ecoinvent Centre, ZÃ¼rich, Switzerland", available on the ecoinvent's website http://www.ecoinvent.org/. More details can be found in the exchange comments of the transportation. 

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'fava bean, feed, Swiss integrated production' within the geography of this dataset, with the product ready for transportation. No losses are considered during the transportation.

This activity ends with the supply of 1 kg of 'fava bean, feed, Swiss integrated production' to the consumers of this product. Transport is included.
